info.title: LUC Payments Services API
info.description: This API definitions provides a unified interface for customer validation and payment notification with respect to the payment of the Land Use Charge. API tokens and Secrets will be provided on request after due diligence. **Suggested/Recommended Implementation** *Step 1*: Retrieve the Notice information using the `notice_id` displayed on the bill *Step 2*: Display the `amount_remaining` on the bill. Please note that this amount may vary based on if penalties are in effect for late payments, if concessions have been given or if partial payments have been made. Do not cache any values here *Step 3*: Execute the payment process on your channel *Step 4*: Send the details of the payment to the payments endpoint *Step 5*: Process the response to confirm that the details sent were received successfully *Step 6*: Display the new outstanding balance as returned in the response API Basepath: http://162.243.53.17/api/v1 ALL REQUESTS TO THE API ENDPOINTS MUST BE SENT WITH THE HTTP `POST` METHOD ----

post.description: Returns the record for a property for which the notice with the given notice ID (`notice_id`) was issued. You can also specify which fields should be returned or filtered out by specifying extra parameters in the request body.
post.summary: Return a property with the given `notice_id`.

parameters.name: notice_id
parameters.description: The notice number as displayed on the bill recieved by the property owner.

parameters.name: api_token
parameters.description: The API Token for this account.

parameters.name: includes
parameters.description: A comma seperated list of attributes to include in the reponse. Default is `'all,'`

parameters.name: excludes
parameters.description: A comma seperated list of attributes to exclude in the response. Default is `''`

200.description: A json object containing the records for the property with the specified `notice_id` (Notice Number).

post.description: Submit payment records for a property with the given notice number (`notice_id`). A successful reponse will also include the saved payload in the reponse body and the new `amount_remaining`.
post.summary: Submit payment data for a notice/property.

parameters.name: api_token
parameters.description: The API Token for this account.

parameters.name: notice_id
parameters.description: The ID of the payment notice recieved by the property owner.

parameters.name: reference_id
parameters.description: Your unique transaction reference code for this payment.

parameters.name: payment_date
parameters.description: The date and time the payment was made. Format: `YYYY-MM-DD HH:MM:SS` e.g `2016-01-24 15:03:01`.

parameters.name: mobile_number
parameters.description: Phone number of the account that made the payment - international format (eg: `2341234567890`.

parameters.name: email_address
parameters.description: The email address of the property owner or person that made the payment.

200.description: A json object containing the latest saved payment record for the property with the specified `notice_id`.
